text: “israil daruvani! ma idiriye æti tavrataya tahavuru karanneku lesin da magen pasu va pæminena tama namaya ahmad namæti (muhammad nam) dutayeku gæna subharamci danvannaku lesin da mama numbala veta pæmina æti allahge dutayeku vemi” yæyi, maryamge put isa pævasu avastha va sihiyata naganu. namut ovun veta pæhædili sadhaka samaga ohu pæmini kalhi meya pæhædili huniyamaki yæyi ovuhu pævasuha
